data.rationale: Deep analysis revealed: (1) Edge type validation completely missing - arbitrary strings accepted, (2) Validation disabled by default in VersionedStore, (3) Nested schemas (properties, metadata, goals, phases) unvalidated, (4) Namespace documentation incomplete. Created Sprint S-026 with 7 tasks to address these gaps under EPIC-got-db. Priority: HIGH for edge type and default validation, MEDIUM for others.
data.title: Schema validation hardening initiative based on deep analysis
